  • Uses of Player in it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards with parameters of type Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AbandonedShipCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p, int id)
    Only one player can use this opportunity. The leader decides first.
    void
    AbandonedStationCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p, int id)
    To take advantage of this opportunity, the player must have at least the same number of Crew (Human + Alien) indicated on the map.
    void
    EpidemicCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Applies the effect of the epidemic to the player's ship.
    void
    OpenSpaceCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Applies the card's effect to the given player's ship.
    boolean
    PiratesCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Applies the PiratesCard effect based on the ship's firepower.
    void
    PlanetCard.apply(Player p, int id)
    Applies the landing effect of this card for the given spaceship and player.
    boolean
    SlaversCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Applies the effect of the Slavers card based on the ship's cannon power.
    boolean
    SmugglersCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Apply card effects to the player: If the power is sufficient: the player can claim the reward by losing flight days. If it's the same: nothing happens to the player, but the enemy is not defeated and goes ahead to attack the player next on the route. If inferior: The ship takes a series of hits.
    void
    StardustCard.apply(VoyageState state, Player p)
    Apply the effect of the "Stardust" card to the indicated player: If the spaceship has exposed connectors, the player will be moved back by the number of exposed connectors.
